result.execSummary:
The defendant Shane A. Knight was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shane A. Knight is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Shane A. Knight was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).
  • Shane A. Knight was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
02:25 pm - Defendant Shane A. Knight in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Michael Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 14ct111, 14cf197 and 14tr2589 and 14tr2766.  (Refusal).  Defendant pleads no contest to 14ct111.  In case 14cf197 - State moves to amend Count 1 to Possess Amphetamine 961.41(3g)(g) - Granted and Dismiss but Read In Count 2 - Granted.  Defendant pleads no contest to counts 1 and 3.  State moves to dismiss 14tr2589 - Granted and in case 14tr2766 - Deem refusal reasonable - Granted.  Plea questionnaire filed.    Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty.  Schiek/Laufenberg/Court statement to sentencing. 
Court Sentence 
14CF197 - Count 1
WHS/POP 2 yrs
CC/DNA Surcharge/Supervision Fees
Jail 60 days w/Huber for all purposes - Jail credit 3 days - To commence on/before 8-21-15 at 4 pm
Community Service 100 hours
Testify truthfully against co-defendant if called upon to do so
Collect Fine of $1414 in case 14ct111 as a courtesy
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO
14cf197 - Count 3
WHS/POP 1 yr
CC/Supervision Fees
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO
14ct111
Fine $1329, IID Surcharge $50, Blood Draw $35
Jail 20 days w/Huber for all purposes - CC to 14cf197 - To commence on/before 08-21-15 at 4 pm
DL Revocation 12 months
IID 12 months
Fine to be collected through probation in case 14cf197 as a courtesy
Alcohol Assessment/Driver Safety Plan
Appeal rights and NADVI given

1:56 p.m. Defendant Shane A. Knight in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Also calling 14Ct111/14TR2589. Schiek statement. Laufenberg working with Asst. D.A. Bednar Clemens - close to resolution. Request plea/sentencing. Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Informing of new court appearance date.

01:40 pm - Defendant Shane A. Knight in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court quashes warrant, not yet issued.  Laufenberg unable to make the March 13th appearance date set my BR II JA.  The next appearance date will be April 14th at 1:30 p.m.  The March 13th date to be removed from calendar.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Arraignment on March 10, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on March 10, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

04:08 pm - Attorney Wright C. Laufenberg in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 14cf197, 14ct111 and 14tr2589.  Laufenberg states does not know why defendant does not appear.  Court authorizes warrant.

03:44 pm - Defendant Shane A. Knight in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Michael W. Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 14cf197, 14ct111 and 14tr2589.  In 14cf197 - Laufenberg files Waiver of Preliminary Hearing.    Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.  Bail continued.  Arraignment scheduled for January 13, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

8:26 a.m. Defendant Shane A. Knight in court with attorney Wright C. Laufenberg.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Also calling 14CT111, 14TR2589. Counsel in receipt of criminal complaint. Laufenberg requests preliminary hearing; waives time limits. Defendant pleads not guilty in 14CT111. Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 16, 2014 at 03:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 16, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
from Atty Laufenberg requesting new date for Adjourned Initial Appearance

02:54m - Defendant Shane A. Knight in court.  Michael W. Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 14cf197 and 14ct111.  Court questions defendant as to obtaining counsel.  Trying to get money together for private attorney.  Court adjourns.  Bail continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 20, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

02:40 pm - Defendant Shane A. Knight in court.  Michael W. Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - defendant will contact PD,  Schiek statement to bail - Court continues $500 cash bond posted.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 13, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
